Director

I am currently finishing up my Mathematics PhD and have extensive teaching and training experience in all sectors of education, including schools, colleges and universities.

I am passionate about education and I firmly believe that teaching is one of the world's most important professions. I am very interested in new and innovative teaching methods and practises, and will do everything I can to ensure all students have access to excellent resources, regardless of their background.

To read more about our motivations as a company, read our philosophy.

To read more about my background and experiences, visit my personal site.

Croesty Primary School | 2018

Scott Morgan has visited our school to give the children an insight into programming and how it impacts on our life. The children have gained much from this and it has impacted on their learning in other areas. For instance their willingness to improve their spelling ability. This has been part of the schoolâ€™s plan to introduce and embed the Digital Competence Framework.
